thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Tiago Coelho
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Tiago Coelho

author: Tiago Coelho
title: Tiago Coelho
text:
So far, i can only say good things about banggood and everyone i've talked from their team.
Got nice prices, they allways have great discounts, whether by coupons ir direct discount, and everytime i have a question, it is answered by their kind team members in a matter of a few hours.
The only two times i could have an issue (two times in a dozen orders), it was solved fast and in a good manner by their team... Once i got extremely high import tax by my country (Portugal) costums, but the value was refunded to me by their insurance that was offered to me and i applied to when i ordered, and the second time i had one small component of a quadcopter fail on me, and after i exchanged 2 emails with them, they refunded me a value that was enough for me to buy a replacement part.
Again, i'm extremely satisfied so far
